pages.body:
Wiki Formatting
=======
### ZeroWiki supports basic markdown tags, below is a collection of helpful tags to help visitors create articles with style.

Horizontal Lines  
* * *

***

*****

- - -

---------------------------------------


This is [an example] [id] reference-[style] link.
[id]: http://example1.com/  "Optional Title1 Here"
[style]: http://example2.com/  "Optional Title2 Here"


![Image AltText](img/zerowiki.jpg "Optional title")

This Is A Heading
=======

This Is A Sub-heading
-----------
 
### This Is Another deeper heading
 
Paragraphs are separated
by a blank line.

Two spaces at the end of a line leave a  
line break.

Text attributes _italic_, 
**bold**, `monospace`.

Bullet list:

  * apples
  * oranges
  * pears

Numbered list:

  1. apples
  2. oranges
  3. pears

An [external link](https://zeronet.io).  
An internal link like [[ZeroWiki:Sandbox]].


\*literal asterisks\*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki

Welcome to ZeroWiki, a new kind of **publishing platform for ZeroNet**, the distributed web we all love.

ZeroWiki is a public [[wiki]] software and most of the pages in this site are editable, anyone can modify it to add or improve the contents. See the [help page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Help) to learn how it works.

Wikis can be used for taking notes and storing snippets, to create FAQs and documentation, to keep track of your goals or as a simple To-Do list. As it happens with most collaborative tools, it can be used in many different ways, even to build your own community.

Use it however you want, ZeroWiki is free and cloneable from your [[ZeroNet]] connected sites.

## ZeroWiki is beta software

This project is still in beta fase and it may have bugs or lack features.
